user_review: Stopped in here quickly for a coffee after a long walk on the mountain. They let us walk in with our little dogs no problem. They have great protections up for the staff and clear marking for guest to stand. Coffee was really good. We got each got a latte and honestly might be some of the better ones we've had in the city. The two girls behind the counter were very friendly and served us super quickly. They also have a nice selection of little breakfast Sandwiches, muffins, muffins and those fancy breakfast bread things.  Will definitely be our new coffee stop on our walks.

New locally owned and locally sourced coffee shop recently opened on corner of Greene and Sherbrooke at the site of a former Second Cup.  Same decor with the addition of some original local artwork.  Good coffee and friendly service.  Nice selection of baked goods and sandwiches, including some gluten free and vegan options.
Excellent coffee and service! Also a great comfortable place to come study or catch up with a friend!
